turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: four pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two specialty pizzas, two meat lovers and two chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large pizzas, 2 meatlovers and 2 chicken bbq, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to modify the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to change.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gluten-free crust for special instructions on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, bella luna's charges $1 for gluten free crusts bringing your total to $100, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to review for you to review the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 4 large gluten free crust pizzas, 2 meatlovers, 2 chicken bbq.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total doesn't include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 45 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. It's possible to change the order of sale.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, what would you like to change?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Change delivery to pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me change that, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minute.s

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your pizzas.
